mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favor WHERE user_id=#{userId} and blog_id=#{blogId}
mapper.select: SELECT blog_id,blog_title,blog_body,blog_discussCount,blog_blogViews,blog_time,blog_state,b.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_avatar,u.user_job,u.user_summary FROM blog b LEFT JOIN user u on b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE blog_id = #{value} AND b.blog_state = 1

SELECT b.blog_id,blog_title,LEFT (blog_body,150) AS blog_body,blog_discussCount,blog_blogViews,blog_time,blog_state,b.user_id,u.user_name FROM blog b ,user u,tag t,blog_tag bt WHERE b.user_id=u.user_id AND b.blog_id=bt.blog_id AND bt.tag_id=t.tag_id AND t.tag_name LIKE '%${searchText}%' AND b.blog_state = 1 ORDER BY blog_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{showCount}

SELECT blog_id,blog_title,LEFT (blog_body,150) AS blog_body,blog_discussCount,blog_favorCount,blog_blogViews,blog_time,blog_state,b.user_id,u.user_name FROM blog b LEFT JOIN user u on b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ( b.blog_title LIKE '%${searchText}%' OR b.blog_body LIKE '%${searchText}%') AND b.blog_state = 1 ORDER BY blog_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{showCount}
